## printableRuneWidth() function

Calculate the visible (printable) width of a string, ignoring ANSI escape sequences. Correctly handles East Asian wide characters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function printableRuneWidth(str: string): number;
```

</td><td>

String to measure


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The visible width in terminal columns
